meta.job_title: Senior Director of Inflammation and Immunology

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead therapeutic research in immunology, inflammatory, and metabolic disease research.
Be a strategic thought partner in the development of therapeutics from ideation of the therapeutic hypothesis through IND filings and phase 1.
Identify and advance new opportunities, targets, and modalities and be an expert resource to guide BD opportunities.
Partner across with computational sciences, protein sciences, commercial, and clinical to develop and execute on a broad portfolio in I&I and metabolic disease areas.
Lead a team of highly skilled scientists and support their scientific and career development.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. in immunology or related field (Master's preferred)
